title: Energy levels of hypothetical hydrogen like atom

content.question: A hypothetical hydrogen-like atom has energy states as represented in the energy-level diagram above. The atom is in the ground state when it absorbs a photon with frequency 2.18 × 1015 Hz. What energy state will the atom be in after it absorbs the photon?
